title: For Sale - Pair of Low Grade T206s
author: Jantz

posts.post_title: For Sale - Pair of Low Grade T206s
posts.post_content:
***********sale pending*************

Picked these up in a Lot and I'm looking to sell them.

The Dineen is crease free, but has paper loss on the back.

The Armbruster has multiple wrinkles on the front & paper loss on the front & back. Someone has also recolored in some of the paper loss spots on the front. 

I'm asking $12 each or $20 for the pair. Shipping & handling is included in the price. All forms of payment are accepted.

If anyone is interested in either or both cards. You can PM me or email me at [url]smorey@neo.rr.com[/url]

Thanks,

Jantz
